verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:
“\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H7107"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* tell \w the|strong="H5002"\w* people \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: ‘\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.’

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: ‘\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*.’ \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H7181"\w* \w attention|strong="H7181"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Where|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w your|strong="H2421"\w* fathers now? \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H2421"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, do \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers? \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w repented|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w Just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w purposed|strong="H2161"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.’” The Vision of the Horses

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w twenty-fourth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shebat|strong="H7627"\w*,\f + \fr 1:7 \ft Shebat is the eleventh month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of January and February.\f* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* red \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hollow, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w behind|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H5483"\w* red, \w sorrel|strong="H8320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w*, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lord?” \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H4397"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* explained, “\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ones|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w patrol|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.”

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* riders \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w*, “\w We|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w patrolled|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* tranquil.”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* withhold \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w angry|strong="H2194"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w kind|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforting|strong="H5150"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w word|strong="H1696"\w*: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H1419"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*,

\w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am fiercely \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w ease|strong="H7600"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H7451"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w*, \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* added \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 1:15 \ft Or they have overdone the punishment\f*’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* measuring line \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.’

\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w further|strong="H5750"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w overflow|strong="H6327"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w*; \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.’” The Vision of the Horns and the Craftsmen
Then I looked up and saw four horns.
So I asked the angel who was speaking with me, “What are these?” And he told me, “These are the horns that have scattered Judah, Israel, and Jerusalem.”
Then the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* showed me four craftsmen.

“What are these coming to do?” I asked. And He replied, “These are the horns that scattered Judah so that no one could raise his head; but the craftsmen have come to terrify them and throw down these horns of the nations that have lifted up their horns against the land of Judah to scatter it.”
